articles.author: Joseph Choi
articles.title: UnitedHealth says ‘substantial proportion’ of Americans’ information hit by cyberattack, confirms ransom payment - The Hill
articles.description: The cyberattack on Change Healthcare in February targeted the data of “a substantial proportion of people in America,” UnitedHealth Group (UHG) said this week, with the company confirming it paid a ransom in an effort to protect patient information. “Based on…
